section3_narrative_prefix: We catalyze digital transformation across the global construction industry—delivering infrastructure that is
section5_cta_subtitle: Let’s explore how we can transform your next project.
about_page_subtitle: Fusing engineering, generative AI, and modular construction into a single platform—delivering infrastructure faster, cheaper, safer, and greener.
about_section1_subtitle: isBIM is accelerating the global infrastructure build-out by driving digital transformation through a hybrid 'Consulting + AI Products' model.
about_section1_content1: We fuse world-class engineering execution, frontier generative AI, and modular construction into a single platform—live across 2,600 AI factories, data centers, power plants, stadiums, and hospitals spanning 1.2 billion ft².
about_section1_content2: Decades of proprietary engineering data converge in JARVIS, the industry's first generative AI agent that accelerates every phase: from generative design and automated tendering to payment certification, site safety, and facility operations—delivering projects faster, cheaper, safer, and greener.
about_section1_content3: JARVIS Project Management (JPM) integrates Hong Kong's renowned professional expertise with AI-driven foresight, China's Modular Integrated Construction (MiC) ecosystem, and a global hyperscaler network to power critical infrastructure in emerging economies.
about_section2_subtitle: We deliver a verticalized AI copilot for every player in construction, turning fragmented workflows into executable intelligence.
about_section2_feature1_title: We deliver a verticalized AI copilot for every player in construction.
about_section2_feature1_content: JARVIS is the industry's first full-stack generative AI suite, serving owners, consultants, contractors, quantity surveyors, and facility managers end-to-end. From JARVIS Agent to JARVIS Air, every module turns fragmented workflows into executable intelligence.
about_section2_feature2_title: We partner with global governments and investors to accelerate nation-scale infrastructure.
about_section2_feature2_content: Through JARVIS Project Management (JPM), we integrate Hong Kong professional services, AI risk prediction, and China's MiC supplier network—delivering 20–30% cost savings and 30–45% faster timelines for major initiatives.
about_section2_feature3_title: We deploy strategic capital to frontier ConTech and critical infrastructure.
about_section2_feature3_content: JARVIS Ventures invests equity, productizes deep tech, and scales via 2,600 live project testbeds. We structure transparent digital twin pipelines—unlocking multilateral banks and PE with real-time credit ratings and 360° visibility.
about_section2_feature4_title: We ensure safety, carbon efficiency, and resilient infrastructure for humanity.
about_section2_feature4_content: Across 2,600 critical assets, we embed 35–45% less waste, 25–35% lower emissions, and predictive health/safety systems—building the physical and digital backbone that powers societies.
about_section3_subtitle: We are building a future where every infrastructure project is AI-native from day one, powering the next century.
about_section3_content1: Governments, developers, and hyperscalers across APAC and emerging economies are using isBIM to build the AI infrastructure and critical assets that power the next century. With JARVIS, African presidents are signing 28,000-unit housing cities into reality in months—not decades. Data center operators are deploying liquid-cooled AI factories 45% faster.
about_section3_content2: And this is just the beginning. We are building a future where every infrastructure project is AI-native from day one. Where emerging nations leapfrog legacy construction with Hong Kong precision, China's MiC scale, and Alibaba-powered intelligence.
about_section3_content3: This is the operating system for global infrastructure build-out—faster, cheaper, safer, greener.
about_cta_subtitle: Join the global infrastructure revolution with isBIM

service_stats_intro: Traditional construction is plagued by uncertainty. JARVIS delivers mathematical certainty.
service_jpm_engine_heading: Hong Kong Precision x China Scale : The Four-Pillar Engine
service_cta_body_suffix: session and see how JARVIS closes risk gaps with live transparency and execution playbooks.
service_cta_body_prefix_jpm: Join the network of global projects redefining infrastructure.
service_cta_body_bim: Join the network of global projects redefining infrastructure.

service_bim_cta_link_text: Book Your Free BIM Consultancy Session →
service_jpm_meta_description: Bankable project delivery that fuses Hong Kong rigor with China scale for Belt & Road infrastructure.
service_jpm_hero_desc: Building the backbone of emerging economies—cheaper, faster, fewer defects.
service_jpm_hero_tag: Hong Kong Precision x China Scale
service_jpm_narrative_lead: Building the backbone of emerging economies
service_jpm_narrative_p1: Traditional project management breaks down at nation-scale infrastructure. Cross-border execution requires fusing Hong Kong compliance standards with China's industrial capacity — a gap most firms cannot bridge.
service_jpm_narrative_p2: JPM closes this gap by integrating four pillars into a single execution platform: Hong Kong Professional Services, AI Intelligence, vetted MiC supply chains, and Global Delivery. This is nation-scale infrastructure orchestration — Hong Kong's strategic bridge to Belt & Road.
service_jpm_engine_1_desc: **Bilingual PM teams** translating global standards into China-executable specs. **Dual compliance expertise** across Hong Kong and mainland regulatory frameworks.
service_jpm_engine_2_desc: Real-time digital twin predicting risks **30 days ahead** at **89% accuracy**. **3-minute executive dashboards** condensing complex site data for instant decision-making.
service_jpm_engine_3_desc: Vetted MiC supply chain with **4-step matching**: technical capability, project experience, financial stability, and cultural fit. **Proven execution safety** across Belt & Road.
service_jpm_engine_4_desc: End-to-end from design to after-sales. **35-45% less waste** and **25-35% lower emissions** compared to traditional models.
service_jpm_gallery_item_1_desc: 28,000-unit City of Great Achievement + South Province Government HQ. Presidential approval secured.
service_jpm_gallery_item_2_desc: 143-hectare luxury complex. MoU with Ministry of Housing. Speaker + 13 Governors engaged.
service_jpm_stats_intro: By the Numbers: Core Value Creation
service_bim_meta_description: Certified BIM delivery for 2,600+ projects with ISO 19650 compliance and mandate-ready workflows.
service_bim_hero_desc: Mandated digital transformation: Model, coordinate, and comply with HK's BIM standards.
service_bim_narrative_sub: Model, coordinate, and comply with HK's BIM standards—reduce rework by 75%, accelerate delivery.
service_bim_narrative_p1: Traditional 2D drawings create chaos: hundreds of conflicting versions, costly rework, and endless "which drawing is correct?" arguments. Hong Kong's new TC(W) No. 1/2025 makes BIM models contractually binding.
service_bim_narrative_p2: isBIM has been there every step — delivering on-site secondment of CIC-certified professionals, automated quantity take-offs, and BIM-embedded BOQs that ensure cost accuracy and eliminate drawing conflicts.
service_bim_timeline_item_1_desc: Mandatory BIM for public works > HK$30M. 4D/5D costing added.
service_bim_timeline_item_2_desc: Investigation, feasibility, asset management & CDE required.
service_bim_timeline_item_3_desc: BIM models contractually binding under HKIS Contract Conditions.
service_bim_engine_1_desc: **LOD 300-500**, Revit/IFC standards, and clash-free coordination for zero ambiguity. Clash detection cuts rework by **up to 75%** before construction begins.
service_bim_engine_2_desc: **CIC/BSI-certified** BIM Managers & Coordinators deployed directly to your project team. Multiple **CIC Gold & Silver Service Awards** earned across **2,600+ delivered projects**.
service_bim_engine_3_desc: From BEP creation and CDE setup to rigorous **ISO 19650 compliance audits**. **72% reduction** in budget overruns through 5D cost accuracy.
service_bim_engine_4_desc: **BIM-embedded BOQs**, 5D cost models, and full ContractBIM compliance support. Automated quantity take-offs accelerate 4D scheduling by **30-45%**.
service_bim_stats_intro: 1.2 billion ft² of proven assets: Mandate-ready, faster, and cheaper.
service_bim_gallery_item_1_desc: Delivering complex geometry coordination and asset management standards for a world-class cultural landmark.
service_bim_gallery_item_2_desc: Full lifecycle BIM implementation from investigation to 4D construction simulation for aviation hubs.
service_venture_meta_description: Conviction-led construction tech investments with instant distribution and live JARVIS data advantages.
service_venture_hero_desc: We back, build, and globalise the best construction technology founders.
service_venture_narrative_lead: We back, build, and globalise the best construction technology founders
service_venture_narrative_p1: Most VCs cannot give construction-tech founders what they need most: instant commercial traction. We partner with the sharpest construction-AI founders and give them what most VCs can't — our two decades of domain expertise and live JARVIS data become your unfair advantage.
service_venture_narrative_p2: We partner with exceptional teams re-engineering construction from the ground up and give them what most VCs can't: a live global project network, proven distribution infrastructure, and government-level relationships. We turn prototypes into revenue in months, not years.
service_venture_engine_1_desc: **2,600 live projects**, **1.2 billion ft2** of built assets, **8,000+ China MiC** supplier network, and **government-level relationships** across Asia/Africa/Middle East. **20 years** turning prototypes into revenue.
service_venture_engine_2_desc: **First institutional capital** for exceptional teams re-engineering construction: **vertical AI agents, robotics, modular systems, digital twins, ESG tech**. We back them before anyone else sees it — geography-agnostic at earliest inflection points.
service_venture_engine_3_desc: We open doors to AI-ready data centers in SE Asia, residential units in African capitals, renewable power plants, smart cities, hospitals, and ports. **No cold outreach. No market entry friction. Just scale.** On-the-ground teams in Asia, Africa, and Middle East.
service_venture_engine_4_desc: Fastest route to **AI-ready data centers in SE Asia** and **housing in Africa**. Our conviction: winners fuse **deep domain physics with frontier intelligence**.
service_venture_gallery_item_1_desc: Selected as a grid service provider for the HKSAR Government (SOA-QPS) since 2013. Specializing in system implementation and big data services for Fortune 500 clients like Apple, FedEx, and Intel.
service_venture_gallery_item_2_desc: SaaS solution uniting siloed data—including BIM, IoT, and carbon emissions. Operating in Hong Kong and the GBA, it allows organizations to share governed data and execute analytic workloads.
service_venture_gallery_item_3_desc: Founded in 2019 by expert teams from Autodesk and IBM. Building BIM infrastructure that streamlines issue management and enables real-time 2D and 3D collaboration for project stakeholders.
service_finance_meta_description: Infrastructure finance with live digital twin transparency, de-risking capital for emerging markets.
service_finance_hero_tag: Live JARVIS data + global capital = financial close
service_finance_narrative_sub: live JARVIS data + global capital = financial close.
service_finance_narrative_p1: Billions of dollars in viable infrastructure projects—data centres, renewable power plants, hospitals, smart cities—stay stranded in emerging economies. Non-commercial risk, opaque cost trajectories, and payment delays create a wall of uncertainty that keeps private equity, private credit, and even DFIs on the sidelines.
service_finance_narrative_p2: We sit at the centre of a global capital network. Because every project we finance is already running on JARVIS and JPM, we deliver the real-time transparency lenders demand to deploy capital at scale.
service_finance_engine_1_desc: Leading **private equity & private credit** funds, **DFIs, multilateral banks, export-credit agencies**, and **green/sovereign investors**. Active relationships spanning emerging markets in Asia/Africa/Middle East.
service_finance_engine_2_desc: Every project already runs on **JARVIS & JPM**. We deliver **live digital twins**, **audited cost curves**, and **30-day-ahead risk forecasts** — giving lenders the certainty they need to deploy capital at scale.
service_finance_engine_3_desc: We fund **bankable feasibility studies**, **detailed financial modelling**, **ESG structuring**, and **credit-enhancement design** — all at our risk. This front-loaded investment turns conceptual pipelines into fully packaged, investor-ready transactions.
service_finance_engine_4_desc: **Audited cost curves** and **30-day-ahead risk forecasts** at **89% accuracy**, giving lenders certainty to deploy capital at scale and **competitive pricing**. **Zero blind spots**.
service_finance_gallery_item_1_desc: Structuring finance for solar and wind power projects in emerging markets.
service_finance_gallery_item_2_desc: Providing cost certainty and opaque cost trajectory solutions for emerging markets.
jarvis_suite_subtitle: Domain-specific generative AI agent for every construction stakeholder.
jarvis_suite_hero_typewriter_text: The Autonomous Operating System for the Built World.
jarvis_suite_hero_subtitle: The AI Operating System for Infrastructure.
jarvis_suite_interlude_description: Trained on isBIM's proprietary dataset and Alibaba's frontier models, JARVIS transforms engineering expertise into an agentic assistant that anticipates needs and executes with precision.
jarvis_suite_builders_description_prefix: Decades of engineering expertise, distilled into an
jarvis_suite_builders_body_lead: Powered by isBIM's proprietary dataset and Alibaba's frontier models.
jarvis_suite_builders_body_paragraph: Accelerating operations with one assistant across planning, delivery, and facility ops.
jarvis_suite_builders_feature1_desc: From finance and design to tendering, site execution, inspection, payment, and FM.
jarvis_suite_builders_feature2_desc: Owners, consultants, contractors, and quantity surveyors share one assistant and one truth.
jarvis_suite_builders_feature3_desc: Alibaba frontier models + isBIM dataset; security, auditability, and governance baked in.
jarvis_suite_agent_desc: Your AI Workforce for Admin & Tenders. Automates repetitive tasks such as invoice scanning, tender parsing, and auto-scoring.
jarvis_suite_pay_desc: Get Paid in 60 Days. Guaranteed. Digital twin for SOPL-compliant certification linking payment milestones to 360° digital twins.
jarvis_suite_air_desc: Generate Cities in Seconds. Stable-diffusion generative design with 500K+ templates. Instant visuals and scenario prototyping.
jarvis_suite_zone2_subtitle: Real-time digital twins, safety orchestration, and unified data environments.
jarvis_suite_eagle_desc: Real-time 360° digital twin capture & remote monitoring.
jarvis_suite_matrix_agent_desc: Domain-specific generative AI agent for construction stakeholders.
jarvis_suite_matrix_pay_desc: 60-day SOPL certification via Digital Twin. Boost capital via visibility.
jarvis_suite_matrix_air_desc: Stable Diffusion Design. Instant visuals, walkthroughs, and prototypes.
jarvis_suite_matrix_ssss_desc: Smart Site Safety System. Reduces incidents through proactive risk orchestration.
jarvis_suite_matrix_dwss_desc: Digital Works Supervision portal. Secure submission, automated checks, audit trails.
jarvis_suite_matrix_cdcp_desc: Common Data Collaboration Platform. Interoperable BIM hub for conflict resolution.
jarvis_suite_matrix_assets_desc: Digital twin + AI FM for predictive maintenance and lifecycle optimization.
jarvis_agent_meta_title: JARVIS Agent - Agentic Execution for Construction Teams | isBIM
jarvis_agent_meta_description: Turn inbox chaos into agentic execution. Collect requests, ground answers in live context, and execute multi-step workflows with audit-ready governance.
jarvis_agent_narrative_desc: Collect requests, ground answers in live context, and execute multi-step tasks with auditability.
jarvis_agent_feature1_desc: CC Agent on any thread — it auto-files documents, extracts data, fills forms, and routes to JARVIS Pay for invoices or VOs. No more lost attachments or manual entry.
jarvis_agent_feature1_detail1_desc: Attachments and text are filed, parsed, and structured.
jarvis_agent_feature1_detail2_desc: Populates forms and routes invoices/VOs into JARVIS Pay.
jarvis_agent_feature1_detail3_desc: Grounded responses with context from the entire thread.
jarvis_agent_feature2_desc: Ask anytime — “Is this rebar schedule compliant?” or “Does this change order breach scope?” — and get instant, contract- and law-aligned answers with audit trails.
jarvis_agent_feature2_detail1_desc: Checks against contracts, standards, and regulations.
jarvis_agent_feature2_detail2_desc: Flags scope creep and compliance gaps before approval.
jarvis_agent_feature2_detail3_desc: Cited answers with trails for sign-off and governance.
jarvis_agent_feature3_desc: Upload a 500-page tender — Agent digests it into bite-sized intel: scoring matrix, BOQ highlights, risk flags, scope gaps. Query it live to stress-test your bid.
jarvis_agent_feature3_detail1_desc: Extracts criteria and weights for fast bid strategy.
jarvis_agent_feature3_detail2_desc: Surfaces red flags, BOQ highlights, and missing scope.
jarvis_agent_feature3_detail3_desc: Query the tender to validate responses and assumptions.
jarvis_agent_deep_dive_feature1_desc: Ingests 10 years of project archives. It understands “rebar” as a structural dependency, not just a keyword.
jarvis_agent_deep_dive_feature2_desc: Fine-tuned on internal comms. Learns that “urgent” means 2 hours for team, 24 hours for vendors.
jarvis_agent_deep_dive_feature3_desc: Grounded in your contracts, codes, and brand voice—cites sources and stays on-tone for audit-ready answers.
jarvis_agent_evolution_lead: Feedback loops refine accuracy to your corporate DNA.
jarvis_pay_meta_title: JARVIS Pay - Digital Twin Payment Certification | isBIM
jarvis_pay_meta_description: Digitize BOQs and link milestones to 360° digital twins. Certify payments in 60 days, unlock better financing with transparent payment solutions.
jarvis_pay_narrative_desc: Digitize BOQs and link milestones to 360° twins—certify payments in 60 days, unlock better financing.
jarvis_pay_feature1_desc: JARVIS Pay turns opaque payment flows into a single source of truth. Adapted for NEC Option C, it creates a digital infrastructure linking milestones to 360° site twins, ensuring SOPL compliance.
jarvis_pay_feature1_detail1_desc: Parses BoQ to link milestones with 360° site twins.
jarvis_pay_feature1_detail3_desc: Slashes 300-day delays that fuel 80% of overruns.
jarvis_pay_feature2_desc: Backed by the CIC R&D Fund, JARVIS Pay is evolving into a full payments-and-financing platform. We integrate certifications and dynamic forecasting to deliver investor-grade transparency.
jarvis_pay_feature2_detail1_desc: First recipient of the HK Construction Industry Council’s fund.
jarvis_pay_feature2_detail2_desc: Integrates certifications with dynamic cash flow forecasting.
jarvis_pay_feature2_detail3_desc: Delivers transparency and flexible capital for megaprojects.
jarvis_pay_feature3_desc: JARVIS Pay enforces a unified workflow that auto-verifies submissions and generates audit-ready reports. This transparency enables contractors to secure lower interest rates via isBIM’s partner network.
jarvis_pay_feature3_detail1_desc: Auto-verifies submissions and curbs manual errors.
jarvis_pay_feature3_detail2_desc: Granular dashboards for real-time project health.
jarvis_pay_feature3_detail3_desc: Enables contractors to secure lower working-capital rates via isBIM’s partner network.
jarvis_pay_cta_subtitle: Certify your next milestone in 60 days. Request a live demo.
jarvis_air_meta_title: JARVIS Air - Generative Master Planning, Landscape, and Interior Design | isBIM
jarvis_air_meta_description: Generate photorealistic master plans, landscapes, and interiors in seconds. 500K+ templates, 2,000 typologies, with sub-60 second simulations for traffic and solar analysis.
jarvis_air_narrative_desc: Generate photorealistic master plans, landscapes, and interiors in seconds — 500K+ templates, 2,000 typologies.
jarvis_air_feature1_desc: JARVIS Air is the generative design copilot for nation-scale visions. Input zoning and ESG targets to generate photorealistic master plans with complex simulations in under 60 seconds.
jarvis_air_feature1_detail1_desc: Inputs zoning and ESG targets for nation-scale visions.
jarvis_air_feature1_detail2_desc: Outputs traffic simulations and solar analysis in under 60 seconds.
jarvis_air_feature1_detail3_desc: Generates modular layouts with high-fidelity visuals.
jarvis_air_feature2_desc: From waterfronts to rooftops, Air generates context-aware designs with native planting and microclimate modeling. It automates technical deliverables, letting architects focus on experience.
jarvis_air_feature2_detail1_desc: Generates designs with native planting and water management.
jarvis_air_feature2_detail2_desc: Returns walk-throughs, material takeoffs, and carbon forecasts.
jarvis_air_feature2_detail3_desc: Automates drafting so architects focus on human-centric design.
jarvis_air_feature3_desc: Air turns mood boards into production-ready interiors across 2,000 typologies. With 360° VR tours and BOQ-linked specs, it accelerates alignment and slashes change orders by 65%.
jarvis_air_feature3_detail2_desc: Generates 360° VR tours and daylight studies in seconds.
jarvis_air_feature3_detail3_desc: Reduces change orders by 65% and accelerates stakeholder alignment.
jarvis_air_cta_subtitle: Design your next city, park, or interior in seconds. Request a live Air session.
jarvis_eagle_eye_meta_title: JARVIS Eagle Eye - 360° Digital Twin Capture & Monitoring | isBIM
jarvis_eagle_eye_meta_description: All-in-one digital twin for construction—capture, map, and monitor sites with 360° precision, no site visits required.
jarvis_eagle_eye_narrative_desc: All-in-one digital twin for construction—capture, map, and monitor sites with 360° precision, no site visits required.
jarvis_eagle_eye_feature1_desc: JARVIS Eagle Eye turns any 360° camera into a site intelligence engine. Using AI shooting plans, it captures panoramic photos mapped to BIM models, allowing real-time progress tracking and ESG measurement from afar.
jarvis_eagle_eye_feature1_detail1_desc: Turns 360° cameras into site intelligence engines with bespoke plans.
jarvis_eagle_eye_feature1_detail2_desc: Automatically maps panoramic photos to BIM models and plans.
jarvis_eagle_eye_feature1_detail3_desc: Measures ESG performance and progress in real time from afar.
jarvis_eagle_eye_feature2_desc: Eagle Eye’s IoT integration detects deviations instantly, flagging anomalies and compliance gaps. Overlay captures on digital twins to zoom into details like rebar placements and verify modular installations.
jarvis_eagle_eye_feature2_detail1_desc: Flags structural anomalies and compliance gaps before they escalate.
jarvis_eagle_eye_feature2_detail2_desc: Overlays captures for interactive views of site details.
jarvis_eagle_eye_feature2_detail3_desc: Verifies modular installations and audits safety protocols.
jarvis_eagle_eye_feature3_desc: View and annotate the full project timeline in one interactive platform. Integrating with JARVIS for executive dashboards and SSSS for safety, Eagle Eye transforms fragmented photos into actionable intelligence.
jarvis_eagle_eye_feature3_detail1_desc: Share full project timelines from groundbreaking to operations.
jarvis_eagle_eye_feature3_detail2_desc: Integrates with JARVIS for 3-minute daily insights.
jarvis_eagle_eye_feature3_detail3_desc: Connects to SSSS so safety events and imagery stay in sync.
jarvis_eagle_eye_cta_subtitle: Map your site in 360° today. Request a live Eagle Eye demo.
jarvis_ssss_meta_title: JARVIS SSSS - AI Safety Platform for DEVB Compliance & Zero Accidents | isBIM
jarvis_ssss_meta_description: AI-orchestrated site safety: wearables, cameras, instant alerts—mandated compliance, zero accidents.
jarvis_ssss_narrative_desc: AI-orchestrated site safety: wearables, cameras, instant alerts—mandated compliance, zero accidents.
jarvis_ssss_feature1_desc: JARVIS SSSS is the AI safety platform designed to meet DEVB's Technical Circular No. 3/2023 for contracts over HK$30M. It turns the 9+1 regulatory modules into proactive intelligence that prevents incidents.
jarvis_ssss_feature1_detail1_desc: Meets Technical Circular No. 3/2023 for contracts >HK$30M.
jarvis_ssss_feature1_detail2_desc: Unifies management, smart devices, and networks.
jarvis_ssss_feature1_detail3_desc: Turns regulations into intelligence to prevent incidents.
jarvis_ssss_feature2_desc: JARVIS SSSS integrates the full 10-module DEVB framework into a single AI brain. Currently live in 100+ assets, it cuts incident rates by 71%, embedding safety into every workflow to ensure zero-accident sites.
jarvis_ssss_feature2_detail1_desc: Access Control, Fall Prevention, Hazard Detection, Equipment Monitoring, Environmental Safety, Fatigue Management, Emergency Response, Training & Drills, Data Analytics, System Integration.
jarvis_ssss_feature2_detail2_desc: Live in 100+ assets with a 71% reduction in incident rates.
jarvis_ssss_feature2_detail3_desc: Embeds safety to lower costs and build resilient infrastructure.
jarvis_ssss_feature3_desc: The JARVIS SSSS Dashboard provides a unified, live view of site conditions across all 10 modules. Powered by real-time IoT data, it monitors worker safety and environmental hazards on a single interactive interface.
jarvis_ssss_feature3_detail1_desc: Monitors worker locations, hazards, and fatigue in real time.
jarvis_ssss_feature3_detail2_desc: Aggregates data from wearables, cameras, and sensors.
jarvis_ssss_feature3_detail3_desc: Centralizes alerts and readings for complete situational awareness.
jarvis_ssss_cta_subtitle: Secure your site with SSSS today. Request a compliance demo.
jarvis_dwss_meta_title: JARVIS DWSS - DEVB-Mandated Digital Works Supervision System | isBIM
jarvis_dwss_meta_description: Web-based portal for digital submission, review, and approval of construction works—streamline RISC, site diaries, and inspections.
jarvis_dwss_narrative_desc: Web-based portal for digital submission, review, and approval of construction works—streamline RISC, site diaries, and inspections.
jarvis_dwss_feature1_desc: JARVIS DWSS is the compliant portal mandated by DEVB TC(W) No. 2/2023 for contracts over HK$30M. It replaces paper-based processes with traceable digital workflows for RISC forms and site diaries, ensuring Construction 2.0 efficiency.
jarvis_dwss_feature1_detail1_desc: Fully compliant with TC(W) No. 2/2023 for capital works.
jarvis_dwss_feature1_detail2_desc: Replaces paper with secure, traceable digital workflows.
jarvis_dwss_feature1_detail3_desc: Streamlines RISC forms, diaries, and safety inspections.
jarvis_dwss_feature2_desc: DWSS automates compliance checks and real-time collaboration. Integrated with CDCP, it allows mobile uploads for instant review while AI flags discrepancies against ISO 19650, accelerating approvals by 70%.
jarvis_dwss_feature2_detail1_desc: AI flags discrepancies against standards like ISO 19650.
jarvis_dwss_feature2_detail2_desc: Accelerates approvals by 70% and minimizes errors.
jarvis_dwss_feature2_detail3_desc: Mobile uploads enable instant review and audit trails.
jarvis_dwss_feature3_desc: As the first platform integrated with MTR’s iSuper2.0, JARVIS DWSS saves 1,000+ hours of form filling per site. It syncs custom workflows with BIM models for automated clash detection, cutting rework by 50%.
jarvis_dwss_feature3_detail1_desc: First to integrate with MTR’s assistant, saving 1,000+ hours.
jarvis_dwss_feature3_detail2_desc: Syncs workflows with BIM for automated 3D visualization.
jarvis_dwss_feature3_detail3_desc: Accelerates approvals by 70% and cuts rework by 50%.
jarvis_dwss_cta_subtitle: Digitize your site supervision today. Request a DWSS demo.
jarvis_cdcp_meta_title: JARVIS CDCP - Common Data Platform for Construction | isBIM
jarvis_cdcp_meta_description: Single source of truth for project data—end version chaos, unify teams, accelerate delivery.
jarvis_cdcp_narrative_desc: Single source of truth for project data—end version chaos, unify teams, accelerate delivery.
jarvis_cdcp_feature1_desc: JARVIS CDCP collapses fragmented silos into a single, live source of truth mandated by the Development Bureau. It eliminates version conflicts by centralizing every drawing, spec, and RFI into one secure hub with real-time access.
jarvis_cdcp_feature1_detail1_desc: Centralizes drawings, specs, and RFIs to eliminate version conflicts.
jarvis_cdcp_feature1_detail2_desc: Serves as the compliant Common Data Environment (CDE).
jarvis_cdcp_feature1_detail3_desc: Provides real-time access with full audit trails and zero duplication.
jarvis_cdcp_feature2_desc: Built for BIM-native workflows, CDCP allows in-browser access to Revit, IFC, and 100+ formats without downloads. It syncs model updates instantly across the entire JARVIS ecosystem, turning BIM into the central nervous system of every decision.
jarvis_cdcp_feature2_detail1_desc: View, mark up, and edit models directly without downloads.
jarvis_cdcp_feature2_detail2_desc: Real-time clash detection, sectioning, and measurement tools.
jarvis_cdcp_feature2_detail3_desc: Updates sync instantly across Agent, Pay, Airi, SSSS, and DWSS.
jarvis_cdcp_feature3_desc: Run CDCP on any cloud (AWS, Azure, Alibaba, on-prem) with zero lock-in. Active-active mirroring and geo-redundant backups ensure 99.99% uptime, keeping your data sovereign and accessible even during outages.
jarvis_cdcp_feature3_detail1_desc: Deploy on AWS, Azure, Alibaba, or on-prem with zero lock-in.
jarvis_cdcp_feature3_detail2_desc: Eliminates single-point failure with cross-region replication.
jarvis_cdcp_feature3_detail3_desc: Encrypted backups ensure 99.99% uptime and data compliance.
jarvis_cdcp_cta_subtitle: Unify your project data today. Request a CDCP demo.
jarvis_assets_meta_title: JARVIS Assets - Smart Facility Management & ESG Optimization | isBIM
jarvis_assets_meta_description: Smart facility management: visualize portfolios, predict failures, cut carbon—unlock green finance.
jarvis_assets_narrative_desc: Smart facility management: visualize portfolios, predict failures, cut carbon—unlock green finance.
jarvis_assets_narrative_highlight: Portfolio intelligence • Predictive maintenance • ESG capital
jarvis_assets_feature1_desc: JARVIS Assets unifies scattered buildings—from data centers to campuses—into one digital estate. It provides a live dashboard for real-time occupancy, energy flows, and maintenance, eliminating blind spots for instant portfolio intelligence.
jarvis_assets_feature1_detail1_desc: Connects diverse assets into a single live dashboard.
jarvis_assets_feature1_detail2_desc: Tracks occupancy, energy, and maintenance logs instantly.
jarvis_assets_feature1_detail3_desc: Spots underperformers and drives decisions from one view.
jarvis_assets_feature2_desc: Connect every IoT sensor into a single intelligent platform to visualize performance in 3D digital twins. Predict equipment failures weeks ahead with 89% accuracy, reducing emergency repairs by 70% and operational costs by up to 35%.
jarvis_assets_feature2_detail1_desc: Unifies HVAC, lighting, and security sensors into one platform.
jarvis_assets_feature2_detail2_desc: Predicts failures weeks ahead with 89% accuracy.
jarvis_assets_feature2_detail3_desc: Cuts operational costs by 25–35% and emergency repairs by 70%.
jarvis_assets_feature3_title_line2: Lower Carbon, Access Global Green Capital
jarvis_assets_feature3_desc: Track carbon emissions in real time and optimize energy use to slash consumption by 25–35%. Generate audit-ready reports aligned with global standards like GRESB and TCFD to unlock green capital and premium valuations.
jarvis_assets_feature3_detail1_desc: Optimizes energy to slash consumption by 25–35%.
jarvis_assets_feature3_detail2_desc: Aligns with S&P, GRESB, TCFD, and HKEX ESG requirements.
jarvis_assets_feature3_detail3_desc: Unlocks green loans and premium valuations through certified performance.
jarvis_assets_cta_subtitle: Future-proof your portfolio. Request a live Assets demo.
service_finance_gallery_item_3_desc: Leveraging live digital twins to de-risk emerging-market projects and deliver verifiable data.
notfound_description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
cookies_intro: This Cookie Statement ("Statement") explains how isBIM Limited uses cookies and similar technologies when you visit our website. It forms part of our Privacy Notice and explains what cookies are and how we use them.
cookies_q1_title: What Are Cookies and Similar Technologies?
cookies_q1_p1: Cookies are small data files that are placed on your computer or mobile device when you visit a website. These text files can be read by website operators and help to identify when you return to a website.
cookies_q1_p2_desc1: only last until your browser is closed. They are then deleted.
cookies_q1_p2_desc2: will remain on your device until they expire or are deleted by you.
cookies_q2_p1: We and our third-party partners may use cookies to store information that helps us provide a secure and efficient service. However, isBIM maintains a minimal data footprint.
cookies_q2_p2_desc: These cookies are strictly necessary for the website to operate and to provide you with our services, such as setting your privacy preferences or ensuring site security via Cloudflare. Because these cookies are strictly necessary, you cannot refuse them without impacting how our services function.
cookies_q2_note: Note: We do not use Targeting or Advertising cookies on this website.
cookies_q3_intro: You can control which cookies are used in various ways:
cookies_q3_browser_desc: You can configure your browser to delete cookies, accept cookies, or reject cookies manually at any time.
cookies_q3_cache_desc: You can manually delete previously stored cookies via your browser's history settings.
cookies_q3_note: Please note: If you configure your browser to reject all cookies (including strictly necessary ones), certain features of the website may not function properly.
cookies_q4_title: How Often Will You Update This Statement?
cookies_q4_desc: We may update this Statement from time to time in order to reflect, for example, changes to the cookies we use or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. Please therefore re-visit this Statement regularly to stay informed. The date at the top of this Statement indicates when it was last updated.
cookies_q5_title: Where Can I Get Further Information?
cookies_q5_desc: If you have any questions about how we process your information, please review our Privacy Policy or email us at
privacy_cookie_intro: Review our privacy, cookie, and site terms in the sections below.
privacy_cookie_terms_desc: isbim Limited ("We") reserve our rights to amend these terms and conditions from time to time. Every time you wish to use our Site, please check these terms and conditions to ensure you understand the terms and conditions that are currently applicable. By using our Website, you confirm that you accept these terms and conditions and that you agree to comply with them.
privacy_cookie_disclaimer_p1: The information contained in this Website is only provided for reference. We do not warrant or represent the accuracy, completeness of such information or that it is up to date. Further, we do not guarantee the security of any communication via this Website. We shall not be responsible for any delay, loss, diversion, alteration, corruption or non-delivery of any communication sent to or received from or via this Website. We disclaim to the maximum extent permissible by law all warranties of any kind. Any reliance on our information or this Website shall be at your own risk.
privacy_cookie_disclaimer_p2: Without prejudice to the generality of the foregoing, we also disclaim any responsibility for the security, accuracy, contents, availability or omission of information found on sites that link to or from this Website. The contents, accuracy, opinions expressed, and other links provided at these sites are not investigated, verified, monitored, or endorsed by us. It is your sole responsibility to make all enquiries and investigation before proceeding with any online or offline access or transaction with any of these entities.
privacy_cookie_disclaimer_p3_prefix: We do not guarantee that our Website will be secured or free from bugs or viruses. Please take notice that isbim Limited and our affiliates do not maintain other Websites of similar names. If you receive suspicious emails from domains other than those officially associated with us, you should call and verify with us at
privacy_cookie_liability_desc: You are responsible for configuring your information technology, computer programmes and platform to access our Site. You should use your own virus protection software. You must not misuse our Site by introducing viruses or other materials that could be malicious or technologically harmful. You shall be fully liable to us and to other users of this Website for any erosion of data, malfunction or interruption of systems and network caused by your access to or use of this Website. Under such circumstances, your right to use our Site will cease immediately.
privacy_cookie_ownership_p1: We are the owner or the licensee of all intellectual property rights of our Website, and all the materials herein are protected by copyright laws and such rights are reserved. isbim Limited and our logo are registered trademarks of isbim Limited and you are not permitted to use them without our prior approval. You may only print off, copy or download extracts, of any page(s) from our Website for your personal use only. You must not use any part of the content on our Website for commercial purposes without first obtaining a license to do so from us or our licensors.
privacy_cookie_ownership_p2: You must not modify the paper or digital copies of any materials you have printed off, copy or downloaded from our Website in any way. If you print off, copy or download any part of our Website in breach of these terms and conditions, your right to use our Website will cease immediately and you must, at our discretion and request, return or destroy any copies of the materials you have made.
privacy_cookie_governing_law_desc: These Terms and Conditions shall be governed by the laws of the Hong Kong Special Administration Region of the People's Republic of China ("Hong Kong") and you agree to submit to the non-exclusive jurisdiction of the Hong Kong courts in the event of disputes arising out of or in relation to these terms and conditions.
privacy_cookie_queries_desc_prefix: Any question regarding these Terms and Conditions shall be directed to
privacy_intro: isBIM Limited respects the privacy rights of users and recognizes the importance of protecting information collected about you. This Privacy Policy applies to our corporate website, the JARVIS AI Suite (including JARVIS Agent, Pay, Air, Eagle Eye, SSSS, DWSS, CDCP, and Assets), and our mobile applications. By continuing to use our Website, JARVIS platforms, Mobile Apps, and services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to the terms set out in this Privacy Policy.
privacy_q1_title: What does this Privacy Policy cover?
privacy_q1_applicability_desc: This policy covers all digital touchpoints within the isBIM ecosystem, including but not limited to:
privacy_q1_app_item2: JARVIS AI Suite Products: Agent, Pay, Air, Eagle Eye, SSSS (Smart Site Safety System), DWSS (Digital Works Supervision System), CDCP (Common Data Collaboration Platform), and Assets
privacy_q1_app_item3: Mobile Applications: Including "Xinqiao East AR Inspection", "Jarvis iSuper", and other JARVIS companion apps
privacy_q1_app_item4: BIM Consultancy and Project Management (JPM) services
privacy_q1_roles_desc: isBIM acts as both a Data Controller (for website visitors and direct clients) and a Data Processor (when processing data on behalf of Customers using JARVIS products, such as contractor employment data in DWSS or biometric data in SSSS).
privacy_q2_title: What data do you collect from me?
privacy_q2_intro: We collect different types of data depending on the products you use:
privacy_q2_item1_desc: Name, email, job title, employer details, and credentials provided when registering for JARVIS DWSS, CDCP, or Agent.
privacy_q2_item2_desc: Device model, OS version, and coarse location data used to support construction site positioning in our AR and SSSS apps.
privacy_q2_item3_desc: For users of our Smart Site Safety System (SSSS), we may process data from wearables (e.g., heart rate, fatigue levels) strictly for mandated safety compliance.
privacy_q2_item4_desc: 360-degree site captures, video feeds, and IoT sensor readings collected via JARVIS Eagle Eye and Assets for digital twin creation.
privacy_q3_title: How do you use Augmented Reality (AR) and TrueDepth technology?
privacy_q3_notice_title: Important Notice for Users of isBIM AR Applications (including JARVIS Eagle Eye & AR Inspection Apps):
privacy_q3_intro: Our applications may utilize Apple's TrueDepth Camera technology to provide centimeter-level precise spatial positioning and AR experiences. This technology captures environmental depth information to achieve precise spatial mapping (e.g., overlaying BIM models onto physical construction sites).
privacy_q3_item1_desc: All biometric data and depth information captured by TrueDepth are processed temporarily and locally on your device.
privacy_q3_item2_desc: This data is never stored, transmitted, or uploaded to isBIM servers or any third-party servers.
privacy_q3_item3_desc: Depth data is cleared from memory immediately after the application session closes. We do not have access to your facial recognition data or depth images.
privacy_q3_item4_desc: This technology is used solely for the real-time positioning of BIM models and AR visualization to improve construction quality and efficiency.
privacy_q4_title: Why do you process my data?
privacy_q4_intro: We use your data for the following specific purposes:
privacy_q4_item1_desc: To operate JARVIS modules (e.g., processing invoices in Agent, visualizing twins in Eagle Eye).
privacy_q4_item2_desc: To provide accurate overlay of digital models on physical sites using device sensors.
privacy_q4_item3_desc: To monitor site safety, prevent accidents, and generate mandatory reports (e.g., RISC forms, site diaries) as required by the Development Bureau (DEVB) and SOPL regulations.
privacy_q4_item4_desc: To train and refine our AI algorithms using de-identified, aggregated data.
privacy_q4_item5_desc: To handle inspection tickets and issue reports submitted by you.
privacy_q5_title: How does AI and automated processing work?
privacy_q5_p1: The JARVIS AI Suite utilizes artificial intelligence and machine learning technologies to provide services such as automated tender scoring, safety hazard detection, and generative design.
privacy_q5_p2_desc: We may use user interactions and feedback to fine-tune our models. However, this is done using aggregated, anonymized data that does not identify individual users or compromise specific confidential project proprietary data unless explicitly authorized.
privacy_q6_title: Who do you share my data with?
privacy_q6_item1_desc: Cloud hosting (e.g., Alibaba), AI computation providers, and data storage partners.
privacy_q6_item2_desc: In the context of JARVIS CDCP or DWSS, data is shared with relevant project owners, contractors, and consultants.
privacy_q6_item3_desc: When required to submit safety or compliance reports via JARVIS DWSS or SSSS.
privacy_q6_item4_desc: Inspection tickets or site photos you upload may be visible to your specific project team members.
privacy_q7_title: What are my data protection rights?
privacy_q7_intro: You have certain data protection rights:
privacy_q7_item1_desc: Access your personal data held in our systems (including JARVIS profiles) and correct inaccuracies.
privacy_q7_item2_desc: Request deletion of personal data, subject to data retention laws mandated for construction projects.
privacy_q7_item3_desc: You can withdraw consent for camera or location access at any time via your device settings. This may limit AR functionalities.
privacy_q8_title: How do you protect my data?
privacy_q8_intro: We employ enterprise-grade security measures, including encryption at rest and in transit, role-based access control (RBAC), and regular security audits.
privacy_q8_item1_desc: TrueDepth/Depth data is processed only in local volatile memory.
privacy_q8_item2_desc: All inspection tickets and project data use end-to-end encryption.
privacy_q9_title: How long do you keep my data?
privacy_q9_p1: Data retention is often dictated by construction contracts and legislation (e.g., keeping safety records for a specific number of years). We retain project data for the duration of the agreement and as required by laws (such as the Limitation Ordinance).
privacy_q9_p2_desc: TrueDepth generated temporary data is cleared immediately after the app session ends.
privacy_q10_desc_prefix: We use cookies to enhance the functionality of our web-based platforms (JARVIS) and for analytics purposes. By using our Services, you consent to the use of cookies. For more details, please see our
privacy_q11_children: Children's Privacy: Our applications are designed for construction professionals and are not directed to children under 13.
privacy_q11_contact_desc: Any questions about this Privacy Policy should be addressed to:
terms_intro: These Terms of Use apply to the use of any service, software, website, or AI platform provided by isBIM Limited, including the JARVIS AI Suite. By accessing our Website, creating an account, or using our Services, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms and our Privacy Policy.
terms_q1_title: What services does this agreement cover?
terms_q1_p1: These Terms of Use (the "Terms") apply to the use of any service, software, website, or AI platform provided by isBIM Limited ("isBIM"), including the JARVIS AI Suite.
terms_q1_p2: By accessing our Website, creating an account, or using our Services, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms and our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree, you must not access or use the Services.
terms_q2_title: How do I access isBIM services?
terms_q2_access_desc: Access to isBIM Services (such as JARVIS Agent, DWSS, or CDCP) is typically granted by an entity (the "Customer") that has an agreement with isBIM. Each User is assigned a unique ID.
terms_q2_security_desc: isBIM implements industry-standard physical and logical security measures. You acknowledge that such measures are suitable for the intended use of the Services.
terms_q3_title: What are my responsibilities as a user?
terms_q3_compliance_desc: You must use the Services in compliance with these Terms and all applicable laws.
terms_q3_usage_item1: Do not breach or circumvent security or authentication measures.
terms_q3_usage_item2: Do not interfere with or disrupt the Services (e.g., introducing viruses, overloading).
terms_q3_usage_item3: Do not reverse engineer, decompile, or attempt to derive source code from isBIM Properties or the JARVIS AI models.
terms_q3_usage_item4: Do not copy, sell, resell, or distribute the Services without authorization.
terms_q3_account_desc: You are responsible for keeping your User ID and password confidential. Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use.
terms_q4_title: Who owns the intellectual property rights?
terms_q4_rights_desc: isBIM retains all Intellectual Property Rights in the Services, Software, JARVIS AI models, and Documentation. The Agreement does not grant you ownership rights to the Services.
terms_q4_customer_data_desc: isBIM does not claim ownership of the Customer Data you provide. However, you grant isBIM a license to process such data to provide the Services.
terms_q4_feedback_desc: If you provide feedback or suggestions regarding the Services, isBIM may use them freely without obligation to you.
terms_q5_title: What should I know about AI-generated outputs?
terms_q5_verification_desc: The JARVIS AI Suite (including Agent, Air, and JPM predictive models) uses artificial intelligence to assist in construction workflows. While we strive for high accuracy (e.g., 99.8% for certain tasks), AI outputs—including tender scores, generative designs, and risk predictions—are for reference and assistance only.
terms_q5_judgment_desc: Users must verify all AI-generated outputs against professional engineering standards, contract requirements, and local regulations before implementation. isBIM is not liable for errors resulting from unverified reliance on AI suggestions.
terms_q6_desc: isBIM and the User shall comply with applicable Data Protection Laws. To operate the Services, isBIM collects and processes information in accordance with our
terms_q7_title: What are the disclaimers and warranties?
terms_q7_disclaimer_p1: THE SERVICES ARE PROVIDED "AS IS," AT YOUR OWN RISK, WITHOUT EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTY OF ANY KIND. ISBIM DISCLAIMS ANY WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, OR NON-INFRINGEMENT.
terms_q7_disclaimer_p2: isBIM does not guarantee that the Services will be uninterrupted, error-free, or free of harmful components. We are not responsible for delays or damage resulting from internet communication failures.
terms_q8_p1: To the extent not prohibited by law, in no event will isBIM be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, punitive, or consequential damages (including lost profits, revenue, or data), however caused.
terms_q8_customer_desc: Customer Data and any content processed via the Services is the sole responsibility of the Customer and User.
terms_q9_desc: This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Hong Kong. The parties irrevocably submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Hong Kong for settling any disputes.
terms_q10_title: What do the key terms mean?
terms_q10_item_customer: "Customer": The entity/organization that has an agreement with isBIM.
terms_q10_item_customer_data: "Customer Data": Files, data, and elements provided by the User for processing.
terms_q10_item_properties: "Properties": isBIM applications, JARVIS AI platforms, Software, and documentation.
terms_q10_item_services: "Services": Professional Services, Subscriptions, and AI tools ordered by the Customer.
